trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

An instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs> object is automatically created and passed to the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event of an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: Экземпляр <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs> автоматически создается и передается в обработчик событий для объекта <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> событие <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.

trans-unit.source: An inherited class or event handler can use this event to show commands unique to the item, by changing the collection of commands in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Это событие можно использовать наследуемого класса или обработчик событий для отображения команд уникальными для элемента, изменяя коллекцию команд в <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A> свойство.

trans-unit.source: For a code sample, see the example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> overview.
trans-unit.target: Образец кода, см. пример для <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> Обзор.

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
Initializes the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem" /> property.
Initializes the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands" /> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs" /> class.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

Constructs a new <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs> object, initializing the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands%2A> properties with the values of the `item` and `commands` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Создает новое <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs> объекта инициализация <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem%2A> и <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands%2A> свойства со значениями `item` и `commands` параметров, соответственно.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of commands in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection" /> objects.
Initially, the collection is empty.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The collection of commands in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection" />.

You can add or remove commands in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.AddAt%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Можно добавить или удалить команды в коллекции с помощью <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.AddAt%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Remove%2A>, и <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.RemoveAt%2A> методы <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection> класса.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to access and modify the commands for a single item in an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object during the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event.
trans-unit.target: Это свойство можно использовать для доступа и изменения команд для одного элемента в <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> объекта во время <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> событий.

trans-unit.source: Changes made do not affect the base collection of commands specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object.
trans-unit.target: Изменения не влияют на базовой коллекции команды, заданные для <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> объекта.

trans-unit.source: Returns the list item for the specified commands that will be displayed.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
The list item for the specified commands that will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Элемент списка для заданных команд, которые будут отображаться.
